path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/GameZilla Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Floating pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using, for example, an outdated compiler version that might introduce bugs that affect the contract system negatively.

findings.title: A BEP20 token must implement the interface IBEP20
findings.description: A BEP20 token must implement the interface IBEP20 in IBEP20.sol

findings.title: Balances and Allowed Variables Should Be Declared as Private
findings.description: Variables such as balances and allowed should be declared as private to prevent unauthorized access.

findings.title: balanceOf() Function Visibility
findings.description: The balanceOf() function should ideally have 'external view returns' visibility instead of 'public view returns'.
